programme.title: The OJ phenomenon
programme.short_synopsis: Why are Americans obsessed with the OJ Simpson trial?
programme.medium_synopsis: Why Americans are obsessed with the OJ Simpson trial, the viewing habits of a sequestered jury member, and the real winner of the Oscars, are discussed by Alistair Cooke.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
